EmailTemplate.name: Pax list and briefing sheet
EmailTemplate.subject: Pax list and briefing sheet for {!Job__c.Account_Name__c}, {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Job__c.Facilitator_names__c}
Attached is the current pax list and briefing sheet for the {!Job__c.Account_Name__c} workshop scheduled for {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}. Please note the fees in the briefing sheet are indicative only and not confirmed. Fees will be confirmed post program delivery.
The participants may change as we lead up to the workshop but I wanted you to have the initial list.
If you require any specific case studies, please let me know by DATE.
Cheers
